titles: The Earle of Strafford his ellegiack poem, as it was pen'd by his owne hand a little before his death.
author: Strafford, Thomas Wentworth, Earl of, 1593-1641.
notes: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "State give me leave, and vexe my thoughts no more ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Strafford, Thomas Wentworth, --  Earl of, 1593-1641. --  Poetry.
